info.description: Retrieves start-of-day and intraday Compliance levels across portfolio and portfolio groups.
info.title: Compliance Levels

post.description:
Find Level based on criteria
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9016::query-custom-method-http=disabled
    aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because this is existing endpoint and we can't change the URL now --)

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

enumsComplianceRuleState.description:
- COMPLIANCE_RULE_STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved Value
 - COMPLIANCE_RULE_STATE_PASSED: The given rule passed
 - COMPLIANCE_RULE_STATE_WARNING: The given rule passed but in warning
 - COMPLIANCE_RULE_STATE_RESTRICTION: The given rule was breached
enumsComplianceRuleState.title: Enumeration of possible state of a compliance rule

enumsLimitType.description:
- LIMIT_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved Value
 - LIMIT_TYPE_LESS_THAN: The given `limit` is less than the given `level`.
 - LIMIT_TYPE_LESS_EQUALS: The given `limit` is less than or equal to the given `level`.
 - LIMIT_TYPE_GREATER_THAN: The given `limit` is greater than the given `level`.
 - LIMIT_TYPE_GREATER_EQUALS: The given `limit` is greater than or equal to the given `level`.
 - LIMIT_TYPE_EQUALS: The given `limit` is equal to the given `level`.
 - LIMIT_TYPE_NOT_LESS_THAN: The given `limit` is not less than the given `level`.
 - LIMIT_TYPE_NOT_GREATER_THAN: The given `limit` is not greater than the given `level`.
 - LIMIT_TYPE_NOT_EQUALS: The given `limit` is not equal to the given `level`.
enumsLimitType.title: Enumeration of possible limits

portfolioName.description: Full name of a portfolio or portfolio group.

limitDefinition.title:
An expression representing the limit associated with the rule; this can be a numeric value, e.g., 5, a different measure, e.g., notional market value, or a mathematical expression, e.g., notional market value * 75.
(-- api-linter: aladdin::0901::dictionary-message-field=disabled
    aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because cross domain limit_definition defined in exception/ConditionDefinition has no relation with compliance limit definition. --)

groupBy.description: The specific data dimension e.g., issuer, sector, or currency used to aggregate holdings together for testing against the compliance limit, e.g., for a group by currency rule this would return CURRENCY.

levelDefinition.description: An expression representing the measure associated with the rule; this can be a simple measure, e.g., notional market value, or a more complicated mathematical expression, e.g., market value divided by net asset value.

levelDefinitionDescription.description: The description of the expression used to measure the portfolio or a group of holdings against the compliance limit.e.g. market value / NAV.

ruleName.description: A unique name for a rule in Aladdin Compliance. To get all the features associated with a rule please refer to the Rule API.

ruleId.description: Unique numeric identifier associated with the rule.

group.description: This field represents the identifier for the group being evaluated specifically for compliance rules which aggregate holdings along a specific data dimension e.g., for a group by currency rule this may return USD.

complianceRuleState.description: Rules can be in several states.

portfolioTicker.description: A shorthand name which this portfolio was assigned in Aladdin.

ruleAssignmentId.description: Unique primary key identifier of an Aladdin rule assignment.

level.description: The rule's current numerical level, measured in terms of the rule's intended check, e.g., duration, percent of net asset value, market value, etc.

limitType.title:
Indicates the logical test being applied.
(-- api-linter: aladdin::0901::dictionary-message-field=disabled
    aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because cross domain limit_type is referred in exception limit type is string type. However compliance limit type is of type enum . --)

modifyTime.description: This records the latest timestamp when the item is entered or updated.

portfolioId.description: Aladdin unique numeric portfolio id, e.g. -1123.

roomToLimit.title:
Percentage difference between current level and limit value. Negative if limit has been surpassed.
(-- api-linter: core::0140::prepositions=disabled
    aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because room to limit is the business name of the attribute. --)

roomToLimitValue.title:
Amount difference between current level and limit value. Negative if limit has been surpassed.
(-- api-linter: core::0140::prepositions=disabled
    aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because room to limit value is the business name of the attribute. --)

conditionState.description: Indicates the rule's state. If the rule is in violation condition state will be false otherwise it will return true.

triggeringEvent.description: The event that triggered the compliance evaluation.  This can include a transaction, a new cash activity or the end of day position calculation.

levelDate.description: As of date for this data set.

limitValue.description: The numerical minimum or maximum limit of the token.

asTradedLevel.description: The rule's current as-traded numerical level, measured in terms of the rule's intended check, e.g., duration, percent of net asset value, market value, etc.

asTradedConditionState.description: Indicates the rule's as-traded state. If the rule's as-traded level is in violation as-traded condition state will be false otherwise it will return true.

portfolioTicker.description: A shorthand name which this portfolio was assigned in Aladdin. This is a mandatory field.

includePortfolioGroupResult.description: When set to true, results returned will be limited to rules assigned directly to the portfolio or portfolio group provided, and exclude rules assigned to underlying portfolios.

levelDate.description: Date parameter to retrieve historical data. No supplied value will return the most recent data.

ruleAssignmentIds.description: Unique primary key identifiers of an Aladdin rule assignment.

conditionState.description: Indicates the rule's state. If the rule is in violation condition state will be false otherwise it will return true.

groups.description: This is a search parameter to filter down results to specific groups. Groups should be provided in array-format, e.g. ['USD','GBP','JPY'].

complianceRuleState.description: Rules can be in several states.

asTraded.title: Indicates if the levels are for asTraded view

levels.title: Fetched level from the API handler

OAuth2AccessCode.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the access code flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.

OAuth2ClientCredentials.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the client credentials flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.
